reviews.review_msg: Spalek is awesome. I find it hard to focus in lectures (for any prof), so I watch the lecture recordings in a faster speed and its great. The material itself is a little tricky unless you spend a lot of time with it, but you can tell he wants the students to succeed. Provides us with study guides and opportunities for bonus marks at end of sem.

Lectures tend to drone on. Not very engaging. Toward the end I would write the weekly quiz and walk out. Ended up averaging 86% on the exams. Dr Spalek said getting above 80% in the course should result in an A. Resulted in me getting a B+. Sweet. Thanks Dr Spalek.

He rambles on during lecture and over-explains things that are quite simple which makes the lectures extremely dull. He barely uses concepts from the textbook which is ridiculous seeing as how expensive it is. Majority of the material he covers are just experiments conducted rather than actual concepts. Take with a different prof if possible.
Im really just out here trying to figure out why he made me write my own quiz because he didnt have enough????????????????
Wouldn't recommend this to anyone unless.  DON'T TAKE IT!
His midterm is very hard but his final is easy.  However, his mc questions on both final and midterm are very detail.  You have to read your textbook.
